Body:
"""Test create login profile already exists raises exception."""
msg = (
    'An error occurred (EntityAlreadyExists) when calling the CreateLoginProfile operation: LoginProfile for user with name John already exists.'
    )
self.client.create_user(UserName=self.user)
self.client.create_login_profile(UserName=self.user, Password=self.password)
with pytest.raises(MockBoto3ClientError) as e:
    self.client.create_login_profile(UserName=self.user, Password=self.password
        )
assert msg == str(e.value)
mock_iam
